original_text:
Let us rejoice and be glad
    and give him glory!
For the wedding of the Lamb has come,
    and his bride has made herself ready.
korean_text: 우리가 즐거워하고 크게 기뻐하며 그에게 영광을 돌리세 어린 양의 혼인 기약이 이르렀고 그의 아내가 자신을 준비하였으므로

sentences.original_text: Let us rejoice and be glad
For the wedding of the Lamb has come
and his bride has made herself ready
